an8.15:4.3: Not reciting is the stain of hymns.
an8.15:4.4: Neglect is the stain of houses.
an8.15:4.5: Laziness is the stain of beauty.
an8.15:4.9: Bad, unwholesome qualities are a stain in this world and the next.
an8.15:4.10: Worse than any of these is ignorance, the worst stain of all.
